# UITextItem.MenuConfiguration.Preview

**Enumeration**

Constants that indicate what type of preview to display alongside the text item’s menu.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Preview
```

## Getting the preview options

- **UITextItem.MenuConfiguration.Preview.default**: An option to show the default system preview alongside the text item’s menu.
- **UITextItem.MenuConfiguration.Preview.view(_:)**: An option to show the view you provide alongside the text item’s menu.

## Creating a menu configuration

- **init(preview:menu:)**: Creates a text item menu configuration with the specified menu and preview.
